alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:18PM CDT until July 22 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Republic County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Washington County in north central Kansas... Northeastern Cloud County in north central Kansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belleville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Concordia, Belleville, Cuba, Republic, Munden and Agenda. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
